servers.name: purescript-mcp-stdio-server
servers.description: A local MCP server for PureScript related tasks, communicating via stdio.

tools.name: get_server_status
tools.description: Returns the current status of the server and its components.

tools.name: query_purescript_ast
tools.description: Parses PureScript code and executes a Tree-sitter query against its AST.

tools.name: start_purs_ide_server
tools.description: Starts a purs ide server process for a given PureScript project. This server is then used by 'query_purs_ide' and 'generate_dependency_graph'. Manages one server instance at a time.

tools.name: stop_purs_ide_server
tools.description: Stops the currently managed purs ide server process.

tools.name: query_purs_ide
tools.description: Sends a command to the currently running purs ide server (must be started first using 'start_purs_ide_server').

tools.name: generate_dependency_graph
tools.description: Generates a dependency graph for specified PureScript modules using purs ide and Tree-sitter. Graph generation can be slow for a large number of modules (e.g., >100); consider processing in batches if needed.
